CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( success__End_Date_Time__c ),
IF(ISBLANK( success__Winning_Score__c ), $Label.success__competition_win_string_5,
$Label.success__competition_win_string_1 & " " & $Label.success__competition_win_string_3 & " " & TEXT( success__Winning_Score__c )),
IF(ISBLANK( success__Winning_Score__c ), $Label.success__competition_win_string_1 & " " & $Label.success__competition_win_string_2,
$Label.success__competition_win_string_1 & " " & $Label.success__competition_win_string_3 & " " & TEXT( success__Winning_Score__c ) & $Label.success__competition_win_string_4 & " " & $Label.success__competition_win_string_2
)
)
CustomField.label: Win Condition
